content.rendered:
Unearth riches and dominate the competition in Idle Miner Space Rush!

This free-to-play online game by Ubisoft puts you in charge of a lunar mining operation. Your goal? Become the moon’s most prosperous tycoon by strategically extracting valuable resources and competing with other players.

This guide will equip you for your first steps on the moon:

1. Gearing Up for Lunar Riches

  • Welcome to the Moon: Upon arrival, you’ll be greeted by a basic mining setup. Your first employee, aptly named “Bart,” will be tirelessly collecting moonstones, the game’s primary resource.
  • Building Your Workforce: Invest your moonstones in hiring new miners. Each miner adds to your overall mining speed, allowing you to collect moonstones faster.
  • Upgrading Your Miners: Don’t neglect your existing workforce! Upgrading your miners increases their individual efficiency, boosting your overall income.

2. Exploring the Lunar Landscape

  • Beyond the Starting Point: The moon is vast, and more resources await! As you collect moonstones, you’ll unlock new areas filled with fresh deposits to mine.
  • Strategic Movement: While the game idles, miners automatically collect resources in their designated areas. You can manually move miners around to optimize their efficiency. For example, placing miners near resource clusters maximizes their output.

3. The Race to the Top

  • A Competitive Rush: Idle Miner Space Rush is a multiplayer game! You’ll compete against other players to become the moon’s mining champion.
  • Keeping Score: The leaderboard tracks your progress. The higher your income and mining speed, the higher you’ll climb.
  • Friendly Competition: While competition is fierce, there are opportunities for collaboration. Join a corporation with other players to share resources and accelerate your progress.

Idle Miner Space Rush offers more than just basic mining. As you progress, you’ll unlock new features like powerful rockets, research options, and prestigious achievements.

Ready to begin your lunar mining adventure? Download Idle Miner Space Rush and take a giant leap towards mining glory!
